name: UpperLimbVenography
title: Upper Limb Venography
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains procedure terms representing upper limb venography.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this set of values to find patients who have had upper limb vein venography ordered or performed),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes terms that represent Upper Limb venography.),(Exclusion Criteria: Does not include any codes or concepts which do not represent Upper Limb venography as defined in the inclusion criteria.)
